amendment.description: An amendment numbered 35 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to prohibit funding to be used to finalize, implement, or enforce the proposed rule titled, "Energy Conservation Program: Energy Conservation Standards for Consumer Furnaces.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fallon amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fallon amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fallon amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
